OOC:Koj attacks so there are no questions also I hope you have more fight 
than the drones. Also This is my last post for the night a champion needs 
his rest. My Lance is the equal to a Double edge sword or a Sallow.

::Koj::
Koj stands up and gets ready for a battle system check list.

::Inu-Yasha::
Inu watches the Koj stand in the center of a field and push the button to 
start the weapon check drones.

::Drones::
Drones Spring up around Koj

::Koj::
Uses his spider web chain wraping around the drones crushing them.

::Drones 2::
2 Drones spring up behind Koj trying a rush.

::Koj::
Grabs the lance 1/2's and fires the triangle rings off the ends removeing 
the drones heads.

::Drones 3::
1 Drone jumps at Koj head on.

:Koj::
Koj fires one Freezing star hitting it in the main body freezing it and snap 
kicks it out the way causeing to the hit the wall and shatter.

::Drones::
Three Drones pop up a few yards away.

::Koj::
Fires a exploding pellet at the head drone removing the that one and the 
rest.

::drone::
A drone races at Koj backside.

::Koj::
Turns shraply and both of his shoulder plates raise up to reveal 2 high 
power Tekno cannons Koj fires a twin beams at the drone taking it out.

::Last waves of Drones::
3 drones spring up infornt of Koj.

::Koj::
Fires off his thrusters and shoot straight at them spinning the lance going 
for his custom attack Slash and Dash. as the explode "Ready From this point 
on there is no turning back."
